entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:36 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:34 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:34 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:34 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 21. Forecast issued 6:34 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
